Room.Name: Amberton Lane/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Amberton Lane.
Room.LongDescription: On the northeast corner of the intersection, you can see a number of small temples and shrines dedicated to the lesser appreciated dieties of lesser appreciated races such as the drow, goblins and kobalds. Although they are authentic, people usually visit these temples mostly out of curiosity rather than to pray.
